name: New Horizon
author: Yuria
description:
Adds new content, including units, turrets, blocks, maps, etc. Mod content are presented with pretty textures and amazing effects, and some maps have their unique cutscenes.

 You can get the Mod Guide in the GitHub-README-MOD Guide.

name: Exotic Mod
author: BlueWolf
description:
WARNING: Not supported on low-end devices.

The official HJSON 7.0 example mod. Both a reference point and also playable. Developed in Canada.
Moving to 7.0 release build 130.

Discord: https://discord.gg/M3hm5z6nm6

A lot of work goes into Exotic, so if you want to show some support or like the content give the mod a star on GitHub!

name: Hackustry

description: Hackustry v4

name: Diamond Ore Mod
author: z0mbiesrock
description:
Adds the Diamond resource.

This mod also adds more than just diamonds. It also adds enhanced versions of vanilla production blocks, as well as units, technology, and more.

name: Pixelcraft: The endless rust
author: Sh1penfire and pankiwi
description:
Welcome to pixelcraft, a mod which gives an alternative to vanilla, and adds lore surounding such world. Copper and Lead are almost overused in mod content, so lets change that. 
Pixelcraft adds two new main materiels, 15 new maps(around), a new planet to explore, 99 new buildable blocks, 7 new environmental blocks and multiple unit factions. 
 Hope you have a good time using the mod, and I'll hopefully finish a few of the missing sprites.
discord: https://discord.gg/xwq8hU5Ww8

name: Gold Mod
author: The Slaylord
description:
This mod adds ''new'' items, blocks, turrets, units and zones to the game.

> Discord: https://discord.gg/kCvJKyb

Comes with documentation of vanilla'a Logic system.
Optionally requires DeltaNedas/ui-lib for extra buttons.
pt_BR translations by King-BR

name: Lead Industries
author: PetruCHIOrus
description: No description provided.

name: Unlimited Armament Works
author: Eschatologue
description:
A port and sequel to Heavy Armament Industries, written in java.
    All development will be implemented here as Heavy Armament Industries has been discontinued and removed from the Mod browser.

    Unlimited Armament Works adds loads of new content, that expands upon vanilla Mindustry, adding more turrets, units, factories, and its own power system, steam Engines! and much more.

    A lot of work and improvements goes into UAW, if you want to show some support or like the content, please give the mod a star on GitHub, Thank you!

name: Example Mod
author: Sharlotte
description: Various blocks, some units, and the block scan pages, etc.... there's a variety of content! \n download and star Sharustry, the second mod please!

name: Progressed Materials (Java)
author: MEEP of Faith (And a bunch of contributors. Load the game with Progressed Materials enabled to view them.)
description:
Progressed Materials, but in Java. My main mod, which mostly just adds turrets. I'm just experimenting to see what I can do with the power I hold.

The name definitely isn't made of the synonyms of "Advance" and "Content".

description: Simulates the world of Aperture Science Enrichment Center in Mindustry.

name: Esoterum
author: Goober, Meep, Python, Eldoofus
description: adds a redstone-like wire-based logic system, tailored for making circuits.

name: Endless Rusting Demo
author: Sh1penfire
description:
The place, a desolate wasteland it will become. The crash transformed everything. Wasteland may not be the best word for it, as there is still life, yet so far away from what we normaly expect. 
 
 
Welcome to the Endless Rusting Demo, and thanks to 
 Bluphenyx#0001 for the Archangel's conscept and sprite, 
[SK]Roomba#8215 for tesla sprite and helping me playtest, 
QmelZ the Void#0526 for helping me with code, 
cl0cks#0039 for helping me come up with ideas 
 
For making this posible. This is the oficial demo for it's v8 update. Maps are unfinished, so you should probibly wait for a bit before using the mod. I hope that you have a good time playing, and I'll cya in the past.

name: (v6) Invincible Cheat 无敌作弊
author: 滞人
description:
This is a cheat mod, abuse will reduce your game experience, be careful for using this.
GitHub: https://github.com/abomb4/super-cheat
email:  abomb4@163.com
Wellcome to feedback!
如果 Android 玩家发现物品描述都是英文，去游戏设置 -> 语言 -> 切换成任意其他语言（如繁体中文）-> 重启 -> 切回简体中文即可。

Features:
- Adjustable Overdrive Projector (speedup, or slow down)
- Team Changer
- DPS Tester Unit and Walls
- Invincible Core and Invincible build plane
- Cheat Items (power source, liquid source, item source with 36x faster)
- Invincible Wall, Invincible Force Projector
- Several strange projectors
- Chronosphere Unloader and Pusher
- Unit Factory that can build unit for enemys

这是个作弊 mod，会降低游戏体验，请谨慎使用。
主要特性：
- 可调整的超速投影（更快，也可以更慢）
- 队伍更换器
- DPS 测试单位与测试墙
- 无敌核心，无敌建造机
- 作弊物品（电源、水源、物品源超快版）
- 无敌围墙，无敌力场
- 一大堆神奇力场
- 时空提取器、时空推送器
- 单位工厂（可以给敌人出兵）

Это читерный мод, злоупотребление испортит интерес к игре, острожней с этим.
Возможности:
- Настраиваемый сверхприводный проектор (ускорение или замедление)
- Блоки, меняющие команду, за которую играют те или иные единицы (или вы сами)
- Измеритель урона в секунду
- Непобедимое ядро и его строительная боевая единица
- Cheat Items (power source, liquid source, item source with 36x faster)
- Неразрушаемые стены, силовой проектор с бесконечной прочностью
- Несколько полезных проекторов
- Дистанционный загрузчик и разгрузчик
- Универсальный завод боевых единиц, также может производить их для врагов

description:
multi
library mod for multi crafter.
Support over Mindustry 6.0 version.
Instruction is in multi-lib-example

name: Mindustry-Extended
author:
Developer:
    Fresh791
    
    
Contributers:
    Many, many people! Check Discord for more information!
description:
Focuses on extending the vanilla game in fun but not op ways. 90+ blocks, 10 new items, 1 new liquid and 13 new units. 
Also adds bigger cores and a whole new system to distribute items using the outpost block! 

Enjoy the new map: Valley of Despair! You can play it using the "Custom Game" option on the main menu and it comes with its own waves, its own boss and even its own 
weathers!

Supported Languages: English, Spanish, German

Please note that the content language is dependent on your game language. (e.g: If your game is in English, the content will be so, too).

Do not be surprised about the high damage numbers on some turrets! Tests were made to balance them in a way that makes them have a fair dps (damage per second). To do so, 
some turrets have been given stats that look way to strong but are not that strong when the turret is actually in use!

description:
Adds multiple vaults, drills, duos, spectres, walls, forges, extractors, conveyors, liquids, mech units, mech pads. This is actually my first mod, hope you like it because i had alot of issues while making this.
NOTE: Update 30+: Some items will be broken because they cannot be done any other way

Credits

> Coding - amione#0663, SimonWoodburyForget

> Map making - amione#0663, Félix Córvus#3546, Pusheen#3121

> Descriptions and names - amione#0663, LordPotaynut

> Sprites - anuke, amione#0663, MemFaceGo

> Report bugs on steam - https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1903525208/1640926712946564500/
> Report bugs (or request features) on github - https://github.com/xamionex/Opore-Mod/issues/new/choose

> Helped in making of mod on discord - simon#8156, Violet#5020, Nope.avi#4037, HNU Founder.lua#5046

> People that reported bugs in early builds on discord - wewemaster#8854, omegaDM#0155, Mwister Cinnabar owo#2702

> People that reported bugs in early builds on steam - Tibault, 月之殇, the_red_soul, LordPotaynut, Dockedreaper61

name: Schematics Pack
author: pixecoz
description:
ENG:
⚠WARN: WHEN YOU INSTALL THIS MOD, ALL MOD SCHEMATICS WILL BE LOADED TO YOUR GAME SAVE. This means that even after removing the mod, the schemes will not be deleted. You have been warned. Aslo you can download normal pack as before on GitHub releases.

Mod adds schematics and map for schematics. Contains schematics for many resources, energy, units, and more.

With this pack you can learn different tricks in the schemes, and improve your skill in schemes.

Thanks to all those who make the schemes, because without you the mod would not exist!



RUS:
⚠ВНИМАНИЕ: КОГДА ТЫ УСТАНОВИШЬ ЭТОТ МОД, ВСЕ СХЕМЫ ИЗ МОДА ЗАГРУЗЯТСЯ В ТВОЁ ИГРОВОЕ СОХРАНЕНИЕ. Это значит, что даже после удаления мода, схемы не удалятся. Вы были предупреждены. Также вы можете скачать обычный пакет, как и раньше, на GitHub релизах.

Мод добавляет схемы и карту для схем. Содержит схемы для многих ресурсов, энергии, юнитов и многого другого.

С помощью этого пака вы сможете изучить разные фишки в схемах и улучшить свое мастерство в схемах.

Спасибо всем, кто делает схемы, ведь без вас мода бы не было!


Special thanks to: Qwaka.

name: MI2 Utilities
author: BlackDeluxeCat
description:
# MI2-Utilities Testing
A Mindustry Mod That Adds Useful Vanilla Utilities. MI2-Client Transplantation.
Mindustry模组，添加一些实用原版辅助。MI2端移植。
（MI2端的终极目标是Mod化，本Mod是MI2端移植的尝试。会添加怪浪怪浪的新功能。）

# Features 特性列表（won't timely update 不会即时更新）
1.Hud: /sync, rebuild all, map info entry, MI2's unit hp bar
2.Map Info(Dialog): check map settings & wave info.
3.Logic Helper: UI in LogicDialog. Check and sort all var names, split names into snippets with a certain string, click to copy any snippet.
4.Drag the title to move UI.
==
1.HUD界面：/sync，一键重建，地图信息入口，MI2式单位血条显示
2.地图信息：检视大部分地图属性、下一波出怪情况
3.逻辑辅助：ui在逻辑编辑器。检视、整理变量名，可使用分隔符对变量名切片。点击切片可复制到剪切板。
4.UI按住标题拖拽

Search 'Sirius' in Schematics!

    AB: AirBlast drill 
    BS: Black Sand 
    WS: White sand 
    EW: External Water
    POD: Phased Over Drive
    OD: Over Drive
    ODD: Over Drive Dome
    WEX: Water EXtractor
    OEX: Oil EXtractor

name: Q&A Schemic
author: Qwertynoob&Anchovy&Mandu
description:
The Schematic mod of Qwertynoob and Anchovy

For Schematics search, the creator's name was put in Schematics and an icon was added.

Thorium Reactor and Impact Reactor have separate icons.


Meaning of SLT (Example)
S: sand
L: lead
T: titanium

-> Sand, lead, titanium should be puted directly.
